body.name: LED Under Cabinet Lighting with Touch Switch, Dimmable Under Cabinet Lights, Under Counter Lighting for Desk, Cold White 6000K
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 56 mins
features: 💡Newly Upgraded Super Bright -- Very bright nicely diffused light, no LED dots of light showing on your countertops, the light bar has 54LEDs, covering a wide range. The color is best for detailed work.

💡Touch Switch -- The touch switch is at the end of the cabinet light, and you can turn the light on/off with a gentle touch. The cabinet light can be dimmed and brightened from 10% to 100% to your liking, at a long press of the dimmer! They also have memory functions. When you turn it on again, it will save the brightness of the last time you turned it off.

💡Ultra Thin -- Narrow light bar design provides brilliant illumination at a minimum footprint. You can use the double-sided sticky tapes to adhere them under the cabinets. The under counter lights are so thin that you cannot see them under the cabinet after they're mounted.

💡Easy to Install -- Double-sided tapes and screws are both supplied, two ways to install your lights, choose the most suitable installation way according to the surface material of your installation place.
💡 Wide Application -- Suit for kitchen cabinet, closet, workspace, desk, display, showcase, storage room, etc.
body.description: Memory FunctionThe light can record the brightness level setting you adjusted last time after you turned it off, and keep the setting when you turn it on again. Note: The memory function only works when the light is powered, if you unplug it, the setting will back to default.Easy to InstallNo need to hire anyone to install the lights, just use the screw or 3M stickers, you can mount the LED counter lights anywhere you need.Are you tired of not having light to brighten your keyboard up at night without the ceiling light on?If you have a standup desk and it is hard to see the keyboard. This LED light bar works out perfectly. You just mount it above the keyboard on a sliding keyboard shelf under the desktop and it works out great. You can have it plug into your docking station so when you turn off your computer the light goes off as well. Great notebook computer keyboard downlight. If your work/study bench is always in shadow when you work/study in this spot and bothers your eyes?The desk light bar lit the whole area perfectly. It is much superior to fluorescent lighting and is dimmable so that the lighting can be adjusted to its most attractive setting. The cabinet light is perfect for meeting your different needs during homeschooling or working. The plug-in LED lighting will be much better for video calls, lectures, and reading. Could be used as a portable light with a laptop because of the USB power connection.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: ‎Wire Clips inlcuded, Light kit inlcuded, Power Adapter inlcuded, Double-sided Tape inlcuded, Screw inlcuded

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright & easy to install
reviews.reviewText: There's one place in my kitchen where there's always inadequate light, regardless the time of day or how many lights are on.I installed this under the cabinet and the problem is solved. It's very bright and comes with a more than enough cord to reach the nearest outlet (I ran the excess cord back and forth under the cabinet to keep it out of sight).I was skeptical when it arrived because it's so tiny but it works great.I gave it 4 stars because the on/off button is hyper sensitive.I'd buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very bright and very easy to install. I attached it to the bottom of my wall-hanged TV and powered through remotely controlled plug. It's practically invisible, and producrd enough light to take stuff from my dresser that I have under TV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, and provides beautiful lighting!
reviews.reviewText: 2nd order of Under counter "kitchen" lights, and we Love them!The double sided tape holds everything securely, the included clips are low profile and work great to tuck and hide the wires, and the plug in links of wires, switches and lights are a simple install.I bought 9 kits, and I installed 6 in our living room built-ins as well as 3 under my kitchen cabinets.I did give a 4 out of 5 star rating, simply because of an issue with the on/off/dimmer when used in conjunction with a timer or smart plug: The description says "The lights will automatically come back on to the brightness level you last had it at." and that is misleading; if you plug into a timer or wifi outlet, they will not turn on after power is cut; you have to go to each light kit and push the button on the on/off/dimmer. This didn't work for us, since we installed 6 sets in the living room, and we were not about to get up and feel around for 6 buttons in 6 different places every night. My work-around was to leave the on/off/dimmer links out of my living room setup. We plugged the power sources into my smart plugs, skipped the on/off/ dimmer and went from there directly to the first light. Now I can turn all of my built-ins lights on/off through a smart plug group on an app! But we did give up the ability to dim in doing so. My wife and I like the level of brightness in my built-ins on each side of the fireplace, and it doesn't appear to be distracting while watching television. But if anyone ever thinks it is, we can simply turn the lights off through the smart plug phone app. It would have been nice had the dimmers come on after the power was cut, but not a deal breaker.The cool white lights make our shelves "pop" and looks really clean! My wife said everything is beautiful!I did install the on/off/dimmer links on the 3 kits (containing 9 lights) I used in the kitchen. We needed to be able to just reach over and flick them on and off when preparing meals. I installed two lights from a kit on the coffee bar section, 5 lights on the main section, and 2 lights at the adjacent office nook... Utilized 3 kits, using all 9 lights, in the configuration I wanted, and everything worked Perfectly!And the level of brightness is perfect for use under the kitchen cabinets as well as in the office nook!I just wish they offered the ability to order extra segments of different lengths of wire if needed. A few of the wire links were stretched to the max!!!Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the light fixture, it's fits perfectly under my kitchen cabinet, simple to apply, just the right amount of light, the kitchen is extremely dark and even with the ceiling light on it's dark, the student desk lamp I have and this under cabinet light helps tremendously. Would differently recommend, price was just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for two areas in my salon I needed light. Works great. Smaller than it looks, but brighter then it looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to backlight my computer in a basement office. I really wanted indirect light. These are great! So easy to install and the right level of bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ones to buy.
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research before picking this set. They are great. They stay in place. The warm white light is lovely. All you see is a tasteful strip of light. They are dimmable. I got the pack with 3 12 inch and used all three for a 44 inch cabinet. Look no farther.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The light is bright, compact, dimmable, and easy to install. It arrived on time and was securely packaged. The light color however is very yellow and will not work for us in the kitchen. I will use it as a small work light in the garage where light color is not ad important. Just to follow up, I was contacted by the seller who read my review. They apologized for the product not meeting our satisfaction and offered a full refund. Obviously these folks know how to treat their customers and will do business with them again. I kept the light for our garage.
This was super easy to install, very discreet cord and plug, and great dimming range. It’s absolutely perfect, fits with our DIY IKEA kitchen.
